item.title: bc Is the Only Calculator You Need in Unix
item.author: moammeriali@gmail.com (Ali Moameri)
item.description: bc, for basic calculator, is an arbitrary-precision calculator language with syntax similar to the C programming language. In this post, we will explore the features of bc and how to use it.
